data.description:
This is a trailer experience for the full experience which is available in person from the Caixa Forum in Barcelona, Spain.

SYMPHONY is an immersive project that brings the music of the greatest composers to the general public.

An innovative experience makes it possible to enjoy an immersive journey in virtual reality, 360Â° technology and 3D sound, with the collaboration of Gustavo Dudamel, one of the most important directors of our time.

We travel to the heart of music, clearing a path for you understand the torrent of emotions that the music by the greatest composers has to offer.

Gustavo Dudamel guides us and highlights the didactic spirit of the experience, helping us discover the reasons why music, with its universal, timeless and boundless message, has accompanied us since our origins.

Through music, we express everything that sets us apart from all other beings: the ability to share joy, sadness, fear and peace, longing and comfort, the urgency of love and bigger issues.

changelog.change_log: Removal of the main film from the experience and adding a coming soon to that menu button
Updating the user permissions to remove all unnecessary permissions. Also updated the Making Of video to remove reference to non-Oculus headsets
Made pause when app is not focused

- Enabled making of video controls
- Created a script fro hiding the right controller when the app is not in 'focus' so that they controller isn't placed right in the eye level when using the native Oculus menu to exit the game. Need to also make this function pause the game. There is also a slight glitch when this happens
